title: Topic 003 Question 014
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that is linked to an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant named contoso.onmicrosoft.com.
The Azure Stack Hub portals are configured as shown in the following table.
You register a guest Azure AD tenant named adatum.onmicrosoft.com that contains a user named user1@fabrikam.com.
User1 needs to subscribe to an Azure Stack Hub integrated system offer.
